document.full_text: fiesta bowl officials are bracing for what could be a scathing report from an internal investigation of the event's financial and political dealings, some of which may have skirted, or broken, state and federal law.
document.title: sports briefing | college football: anxious officials await fiesta bowl report
lines_and_colors: fiesta bowl officials are bracing for what could be a scathing report from an internal investigation of the event's financial and political dealings, some of which may have skirted, or broken, state and federal law.
